experiences.title: Intern-Member of Technical Staff-Software Engineering
experiences.subtitle: VMware Inc.
workDescription: Analyzed Bitfusion performance for different ML benchmark usage scenarios, architecture, and AI frameworks
Automated MLPerf Inference benchmark on NVIDIA GPU and integrated it with existing CI/CD pipeline
Designed software to parse output for different benchmarks and compared their performance on wavefront

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Earthsense India
workDescription: Migrated existing system from AWS S3 to Microsoft Azure storage and integrated it with visual plot split code
Optimized supervised visual plot split code by removing outliers, which resulted in a 6.06% increase in accuracy
Trained deep neural model for calculating the width of crops to attain an R squared value of 0.752 on manual measurement data

experiences.title: Research Intern
experiences.subtitle: IIT Bombay
workDescription: Developed an automated OCR system for Sanskrit language and deployed it to web interface using Django
Streamlined the complete end-end project pipeline from OCR of Sanskrit books to its digitization
Compared ARU-Net and tesseract for creating bounding boxes, with IoU values of 0.96 and 0.91 respectively
Explored models like BLSTM and AttentionLSTM, which achieved accuracy of 88.26% and 94.84% respectively, to obtain the best classifier for recognition

experiences.title: Winter Intern
experiences.subtitle: Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology
workDescription: Deployed an Automated Attendance System using facial recognition, and results were stored in the SQL database
Trained a deep neural model based on VGGFace resnet50 architecture to achieve a testing accuracy of 82.71%
